articles.title: UNESCO and Netherlands design AI supervision project for the EU - Cointelegraph
articles.description: The project will source data on how EU countries are currently supervising the technology to develop the best practices and recommendations and create training sessions.
articles.content:
The United Nations and the Dutch government announced plans to create a framework for the ethical supervision of artificial intelligence (AI).
